General.Name: Yanpai Filtration Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Yanpai Filtration Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of filter media products in China and internationally. It offers needle punched felt comprising dust bags, such as PTFE polytetrafluoroethylene, GL glass fiber, PPS polyphenylene sulfide, MX Aramid, PI polyimide, DT acrylic, and PR polyester filter bags, as well as glass fiber composite felt filter materials and micron filter felts; woven filter cloths; filter belt/dry products, consisting of pressing, sludge dewatering, vacuum drying, material conveying, and desulfurization; air slides, such as breathable layer cloths; and synthetic fibers. The company's products are used in alumina, coal washing, power, steel, cement, and water incineration industries. Yanpai Filtration Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2014 and is based in Tiantai, China.
